text: Dieter Berkmann (born 27 July 1950) is a German former cyclist. He competed for West Germany at the 1972 Summer Olympics and 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:German male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of West Germany Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bavaria
title: Dieter Berkmann
